translations: n.平均值；中等水平（average 的复数形式）
v.均分（average 的三单形式）；算平均数；对……做出总的评价

sentences.sentence: Keep applying and by the law of averages you'll get a job sooner or later.
sentences.translation: 继续申请吧，根据平均律你迟早会找到工作的。

sentences.sentence: Scores or their grade point averages in high school are the two measures most commonly used to predict college performance.
sentences.translation: 高中成绩或平均绩点是预测大学成绩最常用的两个指标。

sentences.sentence: Progress will not be measured by global averages. It will be measured by how well we improve the health of the African people.
sentences.translation: 进步不能用全球平均水平来衡量。它将由我们在改善非洲人民的卫生状况方面做得如何来衡量。
